description: Monitor modifications to crontab files or system-wide cron directories. Monitor for changes made to files for unexpected modifications to access permissions and attributes. Analytic 1 - Modified Files in Linux Cron Directories index=linux sourcetype:cron_logs:scheduled_tasks" | search "modification" AND (file_path="/etc/crontab" OR file_path="/var/spool/cron/crontabs/*" OR file_path="/etc/cron.d/*")
